entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
